amendment.description: To provide funding for the defense community infrastructure pilot program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3702 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3702 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Moran to Amendment SA 3695. (consideration: CR S5900; text: CR S5900) To provide funding for the defense community infrastructure pilot program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3702 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Moran to Amendment SA 3695.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3702 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
